channel.title: Idea for a new option
channel.description: I was thinking after being on some other forums, that there is a "quick edit" option. In other words, you an edit the post within the same page, without having to load a whole new page, its like posting a quick reply but its in a post you already made. I am just suggesting this idea, vote on the poll if you thing good idea or bad idea.

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Talking of mods of such, I honestly do feel it would be nice to have a “Hide Post” mod. Can hide that Spam with the click of a finger, No more eye sores!

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:1, topic:409845”]I was thinking after being on some other forums, that there is a “quick edit” option. In other words, you an edit the post within the same page, without having to load a whole new page, its like posting a quick reply but its in a post you already made. I am just suggesting this idea, vote on the poll if you thing good idea or bad idea.[/quote]Every time someone suggests an idea for the forum software they usually go out and look for the mod that would apply to what you’re talking about… However, I don’t see one here so the absence of initiative is a bit of a turn off. Please, post a mod that may reflect what you are talking about on the SMF website.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Aww now i feel like a fail, xD. However if u made the button for quick edit that might make it so more people know

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This is already possible, click the button on the right side of your post.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

I just like this because lets say you don’t preview your post, and its.

well do this then do taht.

you could catch the taht and change it in a few seconds.

item.title: Idea for a new option
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

baddy351:

I was thinking after being on some other forums, that there is a “quick edit” option. In other words, you an edit the post within the same page, without having to load a whole new page, its like posting a quick reply but its in a post you already made. I am just suggesting this idea, vote on the poll if you thing good idea or bad idea.

Ehhh, I like full edit mode better, personally.
